title: Can I take the class 12 exam again from NIOS after completing graduation? - Quora

response.answer_text: I guess, yes you can. If we see NIOS website, it says “Learners who have already passed Secondary from recognized Board and want to take part admission in one subject or up to 4 subjects for updating their qualification.” Kindly check below link for exact details. http://onlinecd.nios.ac.in/niosreg_region/streamIIIinfo.htm
